valid: For the period 18:00 (UTC) on Sun 16 Nov 2025 to 18:00 (UTC) on Mon 17 Nov 2025
general_synopsis: Low FitzRoy 1003 expected southern Spain 1013 by midday tomorrow. New low expected western Southeast Iceland 1022 by same time

Viking.text:
Wind
Northwesterly 6 to gale 8 veering northerly 7 to severe gale 9, backing northwesterly 6 or 7 later.
Sea state
Rough or very rough, becoming very rough or high for a time.
Weather
Squally sleet or snow showers.
Visibility
Moderate or good, occasionally very poor.

Northwesterly gale force 8 imminent, veering northerly and increasing severe gale force 9 soon
